query: I’d like to work in AI product management and understand both tech and business sides.
I want to learn machine learning and deep learning for real-world applications.
I’m interested in data mining, big data systems, and analytics engineering.
I want courses on software engineering, web systems, and building scalable apps.
I’m keen on cybersecurity and network defense fundamentals.
I plan to start a startup and want entrepreneurship and innovation modules.
I want to learn business analytics and data-driven decision making.
Interested in marketing analytics and consumer insights.
I’m fascinated by quantitative finance and financial modeling.
I want to learn econometrics and causal inference for policy/markets.
I want to study sustainability, climate policy, and environmental analytics.
Looking for urban planning, smart cities, and geospatial analytics.
I’m interested in bioinformatics, computational biology, and genomics analytics.
I want healthcare analytics and public health policy modules.
I want HCI, UX design, and human factors courses.
I’m curious about cognitive psychology and behavioural science.
I want to improve academic writing, communication, and presentation skills.
I’m looking for tech ethics, data privacy, and AI governance courses.
I want to learn robotics, control systems, and perception.
I’m into operations research, optimization, and logistics.
I care about social policy, governance, and public administration.
I want to explore media studies, society, and technology.
I need stronger foundations in probability, statistics, and linear algebra.
I’d like energy systems, renewable technologies, and sustainability engineering.
I’m interested in materials science, nanotech, and semiconductors.
I’m considering a research track and want advanced seminars or capstone-style modules.
